original_text: And Judah did what was evil in the sight of the Lord, and they provoked him to jealousy with their sins that they committed, more than all that their fathers had done.
korean_text: 유다가 여호와 보시기에 악을 행하되 그의 조상들이 행한 모든 일보다 뛰어나게 하여 그 범한 죄로 여호와를 노엽게 하였으니

sentences.original_text: And Judah did what was evil in the sight of the Lord
sentences.korean_translation: 유다는 여호와 보시기에 악한 행위를 했으며

sentences.original_text: and they provoked him to jealousy with their sins
more than all that their fathers had done
sentences.korean_translation: 그들의 조상들이 행한 모든 것보다 더
